text: Mean Streets is a 1973 American crime drama movie directed by Martin Scorsese. It is set in New York City and stars Harvey Keitel and Robert De Niro. This movie was released by Warner Bros. on October 2, 1973. It received mostly positive reviews from movie critics. == Other websites == * Category:1973 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:American gangster movies Category:Mafia movies Category:Movies about organized crime in the United States Category:Movies directed by Martin Scorsese Category:Movies set in New York City Category:United States National Film Registry movies Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Mean Streets
